channel.title: About the serverstatus page
channel.description:
about the serverstatus page. It is getting loadded with full of spam irc's For a example
[code]RuneSun.co.nr irc.blitzed.org 6669 Register to play!! [url]http://runesun.co.nr/ [url]http://runesun.co.nr/ [url]http://runesun.co.nr/ [url]http://runesun.co.nr/ [url]http://runesun.co.nr/ [url]http://runesun.co.nr/ [url]http://runesun.co.nr/ [url]http://runesun.co.nr/ [url]http://runesun.co.nr/ [url]http://runesun.co.nr/ [url]http://runesun.co.nr/ [url]http://runesun.co.nr/ [/code]
Its not fair. When i put my server up it always appears on page 2 because of those dumb ircs. I CANT F*cking help it. Can you guys please do something about it!

item.title: About the serverstatus page
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Well he better hurry up, I rarely get players on my server. There should be a rule so if you post a irc or anything using a different port.

Read full topic

impossible to do maybe only the administrator can fix that and yeah its stupid

I agree people arent posting their real Server IP’s.
